name: 陳隆建
objective:
1. Complex number and Complex variable functions
2. Differentiation of complex functions
3. Integration of complex functions
4. Series and residue theorem
5. Applications of residue theorem
6. Mapping
schedule:
WK 1 – 3: CHAPTER 1
WK 4 – 5: CHAPTER 2
WK 6 – 8: CHAPTER 3
WK 9: Middle term test
WK 10 – 13: CHAPTER 4
WK 14 – 16: CHAPTER 5
WK 16 – 17: CHAPTER 6
WK 18: Final term test
scorePolicy:
1.	Middle term test: 40%
2.	Final term test: 40%
3.	Attendance rate: 20%
materials:
1.	Dennis G. Zill, Patrick D. Shanahan, Complex analysis with applications, 3rd Ed., Jones and Bartlett, Massachusetts, USA, 2015.
2.	J. W. Brown, R. V. Churchill, Complex Variables and Applications, 7th Ed., McGraw-Hill, New York, USA, 2003.
